author: Trisha G. "Honto ni?"

review: Doesn't work at hotels but if all you want to do is watch Netflix at home this is for you. You can even stream Pandora. It's very fun to take control of the Chromecast with multiple devices (especially when you are the one kicking someone else off) but that can also be a downfall.  No remote to lose so that's a plus. Just learned this weekend though that it won't work on the wifi at most hotels so that's a huge drawback for me. You also can't mirror Apple devices so if you are an Apple person shell out another $50 and get the Apple TV.
